lines.text: So- if he got shot while holding the candle, wouldn't he drop it? Accidentally set something on fire?
Apparently not. He's holdin' on pretty tight.
Plus, he's too far away from where the actual fire was.
Seems pretty clear that he set the fire <c=#FF00FF>before</c> he got shot and died.
Hm... yeah, I guess that'd have to be what happened.
